title: A catalogue of all the cheifest rarities in the publick theater and Anatomie-Hall, of the University of Leyden, by Gerrard Blancken, which are so set in order that all may easily bee found in their places. Sic erimus cuncti postquam nos auferet oreus
author: Blancken, Gerard. aut
notes: Blancken's revision of the Leiden catalogue ran into at least three editions before Francis Schuyl took over the revision.
Includes a poem in Latin on the exhibits, signed: Corn. Ã  Maersche.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
